DefaultEvent.Description:
The uncertainty only lasts for a second, before the ancient and angry Lorn-Fluke loses all entertainment in its sport and moves in for the kill. The buzzing air sings of the Correspondence, of terror that drives men to a watery grave with a sense of gratitude. It-

An ambush! Focused on its prey, the Lorn-Fluke misses the other ship entirely as it speeds out of the dark; a webbed octomaran seething with legs and life. By the time it senses it, it is too late. The hideous vessel is bearing down on it too fast and too hard to be evaded.

The Tree of Ages has it right where it wanted it.
DefaultEvent.Name: Reinforcements from a nightmare!

ChildBranches.Name: The Lorn-Fluke hesitates...
ChildBranches.Description: You haven't beaten it, but you have surprised it.

DefaultEvent.Description:
Sensing victory, the Lorn-Fluke moves in for the kill. The buzzing air sings of the Correspondence, and terror that drives men to a watery grave in gratitude. It-

An ambush! Focused on its prey, the Lorn-Fluke misses the other ship entirely as it speeds out of the dark; a webbed octomaran seething with legs and life. By the time it realises, it is too late. The hideous vessel is bearing down on it too fast and too hard to be evaded.

The Tree of Ages has it right where it wanted it.
DefaultEvent.Name: The Tree of Ages

ChildBranches.Name: The Nocturne shudders
ChildBranches.Description: She can't take much more of this!

DefaultEvent.Description: But it's the Nocturne that takes the worst of it, crippling herself on the spines!
DefaultEvent.Name: A mighty crash!

RareDefaultEvent.Description: And the Avaricious Lorn-Fluke takes the worst of it, its shattered spines falling like starlight.
RareDefaultEvent.Name: A mighty collision!

ChildBranches.Name: Ramming speed!
ChildBranches.Description: Desperate times call for desperate action!

DefaultEvent.Description: Burning light! Fear! The crash of hull against rock!
DefaultEvent.Name: Terror from the deep

RareDefaultEvent.Description: Its terror attack is drowned out by the pounding of the guns!
RareDefaultEvent.Name: The Lorn-Fluke rises into the barrage

ChildBranches.Name: The Lorn-Fluke submerges!
ChildBranches.Description: Try to out-flank it and land a hit!

SuccessEvent.Description: The Lorn-Fluke is winded, if not wounded.
SuccessEvent.Name: A hit!

DefaultEvent.Description: The Lorn-Fluke lashes back with an attack of pure spite.
DefaultEvent.Name: A miss!

RareDefaultEvent.Description: The Lorn-Fluke absorbs the attack, hitting back hard enough to crack the side of the hull.
RareDefaultEvent.Name: It ignores it!

RareSuccessEvent.Description: The electric terror in the air breaks, interrupted by a scream beyond human hearing or comprehension.
RareSuccessEvent.Name: A cracking of spines!

ChildBranches.Name: Open fire!
ChildBranches.Description: The guns of the Nocturne still have some kick.

SuccessEvent.Description: No damage! But the Nocturne can't take much more of this punishment!
SuccessEvent.Name: The blow glances off!

DefaultEvent.Description: The Nocturne trembles with the force of something beyond a mere impact. A blinding light behind your vision whispers dire promises of the future.
DefaultEvent.Name: A hit!

RareDefaultEvent.Description: The Nocturne shudders. She can't take much more of this punishment.
RareDefaultEvent.Name: A direct hit!

RareSuccessEvent.Description: Before a drop of water can make it through the hull, they're repairing the damage.
RareSuccessEvent.Name: The Lorn-Fluke hits, but your crew is ready!

ChildBranches.Name: Hold fast!
ChildBranches.Description: It's hold your own or be cast into the deeps!

SuccessEvent.Description: Was that the crack of a spine breaking off as it brushed against the hull?
SuccessEvent.Name: Its evasion does it no good!

DefaultEvent.Description: The lights flicker, losing the target. Just for a moment. Long enough for it to strike.
DefaultEvent.Name: Where did it go?

RareDefaultEvent.Description: Where is it? You've lost it! Wait, it's-
RareDefaultEvent.Name: It dives, out of sight!

RareSuccessEvent.Description: The blackness of the zee is your constant companion as well. It will take more than that to outflank you.
RareSuccessEvent.Name: It surfaces, straight into a barrage!

ChildBranches.Name: Mirrors!
ChildBranches.Description: Out-fight it? Impossible. Out-think it? Perhaps!

SuccessEvent.Description: The Lorn-Fluke is winded, if not wounded. [The presence of the Captain of the Nocturne is providing a considerable boost to skill checks.]
SuccessEvent.Name: A hit!

DefaultEvent.Description: The Lorn-Fluke lashes back with an attack of pure spite. [The presence of the Captain of the Nocturne is providing a considerable boost to skill checks, though this is still a formidable opponent.]
DefaultEvent.Name: A miss!

RareDefaultEvent.Description: The Lorn-Fluke absorbs the attack, hitting back hard enough to crack the side of the hull. [The presence of the Captain of the Nocturne is providing a considerable boost to skill checks, though this is still a formidable opponent.]

Description: Something has awakened its enigmatic enmity. It turns its full attention upon the Nocturne.
Name: Battle with an Avaricious Lorn-Fluke
